meanings.def: used to refer to the second of two things or people mentioned
examples: The latter point is the most important.

meanings.def: nearer to the end of a period of time than the beginning
examples: the latter half of the year
during the latter stages of the tournament
The latter half of the twentieth century saw huge growth in air travel.
In latter years, the population has grown a lot here.

related: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
Acts and Monuments of these Latter and Perilous Days

meanings.def: the second of two things or people mentioned
examples: He presented two solutions. The latter seems much better.
The town has a concert hall and two theatres. The latter were both built in the 1950s.
